  def subtest_autodetect_language(expected,params,cookie,accept, action=:auto)


      

      
    
      
      

        101
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
    begin_new_request


      

      
    
      
      

        102
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
    params= {'plang' => params} if params.is_a?(String)


      

      
    
      
      

        103
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
    params ||= {}


      

      
    
      
      

        104
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
    if cookie


      

      
    
      
      

        105
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
      cookie={'clang' => cookie} unless cookie.is_a?(Hash)


      

      
    
      
      

        106
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
      cookie.each_pair {|k,v| @request.cookies[k.to_s]= CGI::Cookie.new(k.to_s,v)}


      

      
    
      
      

        107
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
    end


      

      
    
      
      

        108
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
    @request.env['HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE']= accept


      

      
    
      
      

        109
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
    get action, params


      

      
    
      
      

        110
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
    assert_equal expected, @controller.current_language


      

      
    
      
      

        111
        
        310a0f92
        Jean-Philippe Lang
        
    if action == :auto


      

      
    
      
      

        112
        
        310a0f92

        310a0f92
